title: キラめく、輝く、あの子の背

text_block_list.text: Rice Shower was feeling down due to Mihono Bourbon's injury. However, running alongside Matikanetannhauser reminded her of the joy of running.
Determined to get stronger by the time Mihono Bourbon returns, Rice Shower resumed training and rapidly grew——
Mihono Bourbon, who was also depressed by her own injury, found courage in Rice Shower's running.
From that story, Matikanetannhauser realized that Rice Shower was the 'protagonist' who gave strength to Mihono Bourbon's heart.
The way she kept repeating and savoring the word 'protagonist'... was very impressive.
